alert.note: Alert for Letcher (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 6:06AM EDT until July 28 at 7:26PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... North Fork Kentucky River at Whitesburg affecting Letcher County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Kentucky River at Whitesburg. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Homes along the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 10.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:30 AM EDT Thursday was 10.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.8 feet late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.3 feet on 09/14/1982. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 10 AM this morning.
